items.content_html: Lillihub is a simple, lightweight micro.blog web client with a light/dark mode and responsive design. It is built using Deno, HTML, CSS, and a sprinkle of vanilla JavaScript. It is delightfully usable without JavaScript being enabled.
items.title: heyloura/lillihub-client: Lillihub is a simple, lightweight micro.blog web client with a light/dark mode and responsive design. It is built using Deno, HTML, CSS, and a sprinkle of vanilla JavaScript. It is delightfully usable without JavaScript being enabled.

items.content_html: MUI Stepper Pro is a fully customizable and lightweight stepper component built for React and Material-UI. Designed for flexibility and ease of use, it supports dynamic steps, validations, and smooth transitions. Whether you're building multi-step forms or interactive wizards, this open-source stepper makes navigation seamless.
items.title: Neeraj000Monga/Custom_Stepper: MUI Stepper Pro is a fully customizable and lightweight stepper component built for React and Material-UI. Designed for flexibility and ease of use, it supports dynamic steps, validations, and smooth transitions. Whether you're building multi-step forms or interactive wizards, this open-source stepper makes navigation seamless.

items.content_html: üè† A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
